taxonomicnotes: There is some colour pattern and colouration variation geographically which should be examined.
rationale: As for N. orthonotus, this species is widespread and common over a wide region in Mozambique. Habitats are abundant. Localized impacts are known from the southern range for the species where it may be locally rare and threatened.
evaluator: Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Unit)
